item.title: Improving My Network: A Messy Situation
item.description: In November 2020, I decided to take the Level 1 Techs Devember Challenge, which is a challenge for anyone to spend an hour a day working on a tech project. The challenge is sponsored by Linode, which offers some free credit for new users taking the challenge. I opted to take the challenge and finally buy a domain and set up my network properly. Since I’ve never had a domain before, my experience with proper networking and dns management were novice at best, so I figured it would take me plenty of time to get things setup.
